All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionByAPlayerNotInTheGameException
Exception thrown when an action is attempted by a player who is not part of the game.
Board
Board model class This class represents the game board that contains decks of cards and cards placed on the board.
BoardPopUpController
Controller class for the board pop-up view in the GUI.
BoardSetupException
Exception thrown when there is an error in setting up the game board.
Book
Book Class: contains the disposition of the cards of the player
Buffer
A synchronized buffer for storing and retrieving input data.
CardType
This enum represents the different types of cards available in the game.
Cell
Represents cell in player's book for placing playable cards.
CellNotAvailableException
Exception thrown when an action is attempted on a cell that is not available.
Chat
The Chat class manages a list of messages exchanged between players.
ClientGenericMessage
SocketClientGenericMessage class.
ClientHandler
ClientHandler Class
Handle all the incoming network requests that clients can require to create,join,leave or reconnect to a game
by the Socket Network protocol
ClientInterface
ClientInterface defines common actions that a client can perform in a game.
ClientMain
The main class for the client application.

SocketClientMessageLeave class.

ClientMsgStartGame
 
ClientRMI
RMIClient Class
Handle all the network communications between RMIClient and RMIServer
From the first connection, to the creation, joining, leaving, grabbing and positioning messages through the network
by the RMI Network Protocol
ClientSocket
ClientSocket Class
Handle all the network communications between ClientSocket and ClientHandler
From the first connection, to the creation, joining, leaving, grabbing and positioning messages through the network
by the Socket Network Protocol
Color
Enumeration representing different colors for the players with associated image paths.
ColorConsole
The ConsoleColors enum provides ANSI escape codes for coloring console output.
ConnectionType
Enumeration representing the types of connections available for client-server communication.
ControllerGUI
Abstract controller class to manage user inputs in the GUI.
CornerLabel
This enum represents the different types of labels that can be assigned to the corners of cards in the game.
CornerType
This enum represents the different types of corners of the cards
Deck
The `Deck` class represents a deck of playable cards.
DeckEmptyException
Exception thrown when an action is attempted on an empty deck.
DeckFullException
Exception thrown when an attempt is made to add a card to a full deck.
DefaultValue
This class contains all the default values used in the project.
Event
Represents an event that communicates changes or actions in the game.
EventList
Represents a list of events that can be queued and retrieved for processing.
EventType
Enum representing various types of events that can occur in the game.
FileCastException
Exception thrown when an invalid cast is attempted while reading a file.
FileDisconnection
FileDisconnection class FileDisconnection is the class that manages the disconnection of the player It reads and writes the disconnection state from and to a file using json (JSONParser)
FileReadException
Exception thrown when an error occurs while reading a file.
Flow
Abstract class that defines common flow operations for managing game flow and interactions.
Game
Represents a game instance in the application.
GameController
GameController Class Controls a specific Game Game by allowing a player to perform all actions that can be executed in a game The class can add, remove, reconnect and disconnects players to the game and let players pick and place cards from the Board to them Book.
GameControllerInterface
This interface contains all the action a player can do in a single game
GameEndedController
This class is the controller for the game ended scene.
GameEndedException
Exception thrown when an operation is attempted on a game that has already ended.
GameFlow
Manages the flow of the game and interaction between client and server.
GameImmutable
Represents an immutable version of the Game model specifically designed for transmission to clients over the network.
GameListenerInterface
This interface is used to notify the client about the changes in the game
GameListenersClient
This class implements the GameListenerInterface and acts as a client-side listener for game events from the server.
GameListenersServer
Class used to pass the GameListener to the client via socket It has a private ObjectOutputStream where it writes the data
GameStatus
Enum representing the status of the game.
GenericErrorController
Controller class for handling generic error messages in the GUI.
GoalType
This enum represents the different types of goals that players can achieve in the game.
GoldCard
Gold card class GoldCard is a type of PlayableCard with additional properties
GUI
GUI class.
GUIApplication
This class is the main class of the GUI, it extends Application and it is used to start the GUI.
IllegalArgumentException
Exception thrown when an illegal or inappropriate argument is passed to a method.
InitialCard
Initial Card class InitialCard is a type of PlayableCard with additional properties
InitializeCardsController
Controller class for initializing and managing UI components related to selecting cards in the GUI.
InputController
Manages user input and coordinates message sending within the game.
InputGUI
Reads inputs from the graphical user interface (GUI) and adds them to a buffer for processing.
InputReader
Interface for handling input readers, applicable to both Text-based User Interface (TUI) and Graphical User Interface (GUI).
InputTUI
Class designed to read user input from the console and add it to a data buffer.
InvalidPointsException
Exception thrown when invalid points are encountered in a game or calculation.
JSONParsingException
Exception thrown when an error occurs during JSON parsing.
ListenersHandler
ListenersHandler class is responsible for managing a List of GameListener objects and for notifying the view when a change occurs in the GameModel
LobbyController
Controller class for managing the lobby of the game This controller handles setting player nicknames, game ID, player images, and controlling the ready button.
MainSceneController
Controller class for managing the main game scene
MenuController
Controller class for managing the menu of the game.
Message
The Message class represents a message sent by a player in the chat.
MessagePrivate
The MessagePrivate class represents a private message sent by a player in the chat.

Thread responsible for sending periodic "ping" messages to the server (from each client) to indicate that the client is still active.

Provides methods for printing messages asynchronously, allowing the main application to continue executing other operations without waiting for the printing to complete.
PrintAsync
